Posts.Content: Hi everyone. 2 weeks ago I had a lumpectomy and a Sentinel Lymph Node Biopsy. Fortunately all results came back clear and now I'm waiting for my appointment to see the oncologist to organise my Radiotherapy . In the mean time I have been given my first prescription for Tamoxifen . What do you all make if this dru?, what are the most common side effects that you as patients have had, rather than the ones you read about in the packet .?
Posts.Title: Tamoxifen - Discuss
